title: Canada Arrests Suspect in 2023 Gold Heist Near Scene of the Crime
description: A suspect in what investigators call Canada’s largest-ever gold heist was arrested on Monday not far from the scene of the crime.
content: A suspect in what investigators call Canada’s largest-ever gold heist was arrested on Monday not far from the scene of the crime.
